laboratory_examinations.findings: Laboratory tests revealed leukocytosis with eosinophilia.
Cultures of samples obtained from several lymph nodes and skin revealed E. spinifera.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: After 6 months, cultures of skin biopsy specimens were negative for fungi.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Microscopic examination showed scarce spherical septate mycotic elements, with brownish pigment in the dermis.
